text: Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad ! Be strong,
Be brave,
Be smart,
Be kind
Solving problems we don�t mind!
We are the closest friends you�ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad

Dashing through the snowIn a one horse open sleigh O'er the fields we go
Laughing all the way

Bells on bob tails ring Making spirits bright What fun it is to laugh and sing
A sleighing song tonight
Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to help Santa Claus with his sleigh Oh, Jingle bells, jingle bells
Jingle all the way Oh, what fun it is to help
“Babies! Santa needs your help!”
“We get to go to the North Pole?!”
“I guess so! Let’s power up!”
“Ba-Ba-Boom! We’re ready to zoom!”
“Thank goodness you’re here! My sleigh can’t fly without bells! I’m missing 10 bells, and all of my elves are working hard to get the toys ready for Christmas day!”
“Don’t worry Mr. Claus! We will find your bells!”
We’re looking for the bells, All over the North Pole.Helping Santa Claus,
So he can fill his sleigh and go! He’s lost more than a few. Let’s find them 1 through 10!
Once we find them all! Then our search will surely end!
Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Where are all of you If we don’t find you  Christmas will be blue
Jingle bells, jingle bellsWe can hear you ring We have found all the bells It makes us want to sing
“Thanks, Bottle Squad! Christmas is saved!”
“YAY!”
“Want to go for a ride in my sleigh?”
“Oh yes pleassseeeee!”
Dashing through the sky In Santa’s open sleigh O'er the clouds we fly Laughing all the way

Bells on bob tails ring Making spirits bright What fun it is to laugh and sing
A sleighing song tonight
Oh, jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way Oh, what fun it is to ride In Santa’s open sleigh

Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way
Oh, what fun it is to ride In Santa’s open sleigh
“Thank you, Bottle Squad! Meeeeerry Christmas!
“Merry Christmas Santa!
Ho ho ho!”

If you need our help, you can count on us!
That’s our Ba-ba-promise to you!
Have a very Merry Christmas!”
